name: Merisomet
description:
Merisomet is a waifu-style gacha game for mobile devices (Android and on release iOS), featuring mission gameplay similar to that in the Ogre Battle series. Currently the game has one chapter of mission content (nine plot missions and three side missions), plus 'personal quest' chapters of four missions each for the Dryad, Selkie, Dragon and Centaur characters.

The game is currently in mid-development, so there are a lot of rough edges. Currently we're particularly interested in feedback on the mission structure/length and the character dialog/personal quests; but any all feedback (and bug reports!) will be incredibly greatly appreciated. We're happy to receive feedback here or more directly on our discord.

The game is also available via Google Play through a closed alpha - join our discord for details.
